[vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” bg_color=”#303e49″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”light” text_align=”center” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” overlay_strength=”1″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=”curve”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” top_margin=”auto” bottom_margin=”auto” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”60″][vc_column_text]

Our Privacy Policy.

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”15″][vc_column_text]

Please read these terms.

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”150″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” translate_y=”-120″ zindex=”500″ overlay_strength=”1″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=”curve”][vc_column column_padding=”padding-3-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”small_depth” column_border_radius=”none” bottom_margin=”-120″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]Website Visitors

Like most website operators, Forge3, Ltd. collects non-personally-identifying information of the sort that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request. Forge3, Ltd.’s purpose in collecting non-personally identifying information is to better understand how Forge3, Ltd.’s visitors use its website. From time to time, Forge3, Ltd. may release non-personally-identifying information in the aggregate, e.g., by publishing a report on trends in the usage of its website.

Forge3, Ltd. also collects potentially personally-identifying information like Internet Protocol (IP) addresses. Forge3, Ltd. does not use such information to identify its visitors, however, and does not disclose such information, other than under the same circumstances that it uses and discloses personally-identifying information, as described below.

Gathering of Personally-Identifying Information

Certain visitors to Forge3, Ltd.’s websites choose to interact with Forge3, Ltd. in ways that require Forge3, Ltd. to gather personally-identifying information. The amount and type of information that Forge3, Ltd. gathers depends on the nature of the interaction. For example, we ask visitors who sign up for an account at forge3.com to provide a username and email address. Those who engage in transactions with Forge3, Ltd. are asked to provide additional information, including as necessary the personal and financial information required to process those transactions. In each case, Forge3, Ltd. collects such information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the visitor’s interaction with Forge3, Ltd. Forge3, Ltd. does not disclose personally-identifying information other than as described below. And visitors can always refuse to supply personally-identifying information, with the caveat that it may prevent them from engaging in certain website-related activities.

Use of Personal Data

Forge3, Ltd. may collect aggregated statistics about the behavior of visitors to its websites. For instance, Forge3, Ltd. may monitor the most popular website account on the forge3.com site. Forge3, Ltd. may display this information publicly or provide it to others. Forge3, Ltd. does not disclose personally-identifying information other than as described below.

Protection of Certain Personally-Identifying Information

Forge3, Ltd. discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only to those of its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to process it on Forge3, Ltd.’s behalf or to provide services available at Forge3, Ltd.’s websites, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to others. Some of those employees, contractors and affiliated organizations may be located outside of your home country; by using Forge3, Ltd.’s websites, you consent to the transfer of such information to them. Forge3, Ltd. will not rent or sell potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information to anyone. Other than to its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations, as described above, Forge3, Ltd. discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only when required to do so by law, or when Forge3, Ltd. believes in good faith that disclosure is reasonably necessary to protect the property or rights of Forge3, Ltd., third parties or the public at large. If you are a registered user of an Forge3, Ltd. website and have supplied your email address, Forge3, Ltd. may occasionally send you an email to tell you about new features, solicit your feedback, or just keep you up to date with what’s going on with Forge3, Ltd. and our products. We expect to keep this type of email to a minimum. If you send us a request (for example via a support email or via one of our feedback mechanisms), we reserve the right to publish it in order to help us clarify or respond to your request or to help us support other users. Forge3, Ltd. takes all measures reasonably necessary to protect against the unauthorized access, use, alteration or destruction of potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information.

Cookies

A cookie is a string of information that a website stores on a visitor’s computer, and that the visitor’s browser provides to the website each time the visitor returns. Forge3, Ltd. uses cookies to help Forge3, Ltd. identify and track visitors, their usage of Forge3, Ltd. website, and their website access preferences. Forge3, Ltd. visitors who do not wish to have cookies placed on their computers should set their browsers to refuse cookies before using Forge3, Ltd.’s websites, with the drawback that certain features of Forge3, Ltd.’s websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies.

Privacy Policy Changes

Although most changes are likely to be minor, Forge3, Ltd. may change its Privacy Policy from time to time, and in Forge3, Ltd.’s sole discretion. Forge3, Ltd. encourages visitors to frequently check this page for any changes to its Privacy Policy.

This Privacy Policy is available under a Creative Commons Share-alike license.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”60″][vc_text_separator title=”” i_type=”linecons” i_icon_linecons=”vc_li vc_li-world” i_color=”grey” add_icon=”true”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
